item.title: The Ingredients in a Tallow Balm: What Makes It So Effective?
item.description: The Ingredients in a Tallow Balm Not all moisturisers are created equal. Tallow balm NZ is made from simple, natural ingredients that nourish the skin without synthetic additives. 1.
